OOC: I know. Listen to Deadeye Duck's voice. That's Scott McNeil without a =
doubt, right? And that robot thing was Toad Borg. He should have eaten ever=
ybody in the show in the last episode...

BIC: T
  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: KSLawdogg@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monda=
y, July 16, 2001 5:57 PM
  Subject: Shockwave & Unitron


  (Unitron and Sh=
ockwave are a few hundred feet in the air and it would be easy 
  for them =
to see someone jumping at them with a sword.

  And Deadeye Duck owns Bucky=
 O'Hare.  What was the name of that cool robot who 
  worked for the Toadie=
s?)

  Shockwave/Unitron:



  "All are inferior to Decepticons.  They cann=
ot defeat eons of experience."

  After Shockwave stated that simple fact l=
oud enough for anyone to hear, the 
  space fighter that was his current mo=
de did some sharp maneuvers, avoiding 
  the missiles, but three of Hot Rod=
's lasers dug into his left wing, not 
  piercing it though.  He returned f=
ire wtih two missiles, splitting apart, one 
  heading for Windlord and the=
 other for Train Wreck.

  ---

  Unitron avoided the missiles relatively e=
asily, some shrapnel digging into 
  his back fins but it wasn't to bad.  H=
e was able to easily avoid the incoming 
  robot, Aerotaur, but two of the =
robot's lasers struck his space fighter form 
  in the side, barely missing=
 some vital parts.

  "Maximal filth." he cursed, firing off fifteen rapid =
lasers at Hot Rod and 
  making a u-turn in the air that put some pressure =
on his engines, launching 
  off a missile at Aerotaur as he adjusted his c=
ourse so he was no longer 
  flying towards him.

  "Shall I call the Ramor=
a for aid?" Unitron asked via comm. with Shockwave.

  "Unneccessary.  We s=
hall contact Firestarter only when he is needed."

   

  Your use of Yahoo=
! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
